vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: A root vegetable, usually orange in color, with a crisp texture when fresh

vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.description: A versatile vegetable that is good for boiling, roasting, baking and making chips

vegetables.name: Tomato
vegetables.description: A red or yellowish fruit with a juicy pulp, used as a vegetable in cooking

vegetables.name: Cucumber
vegetables.description: A long, green-skinned fruit with watery flesh, usually eaten raw in salads or pickled

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.description: A plant of the cabbage family, whose large, edible flower head is eaten as a vegetable
